MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG7 postcode area of Dumfries and Galloway. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.45am due to a fault on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27am on Wednesday, 10 February 2021.
